type.description:
### ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ‚ö†Ô∏è

## Custom Entity Id

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/custom_entity_id).

Checks for the Entity ID associated with a Custom Projectile or Custom Area of Effect Cloud.

Type ID: `apugli:custom_entity_id`



---

### üìù Note

This condition will always return false if used outside of a Custom Projectile or Custom Area of Effect Cloud.



---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:custom_entity_id",
    "entity_id": "example:fireball"
}
```
This example checks if a custom entity has an entity id of `example:fireball`.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Custom Entity Id (Entity Condition Type) date: 2022-10-30

Custom Entity Id

Entity Condition Type.

Checks for the Entity ID associated with a Custom Projectile or Custom Area of Effect Cloud.

Type ID: apugli:custom_entity_id

!!! note

This condition will always return false if used outside of a Custom Projectile or Custom Area of Effect Cloud.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
entity_id Identifier The entity id to cehck

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:custom_entity_id",
    "entity_id": "example:fireball"
}

This example checks if a custom entity has an entity id of example:fireball.
